channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Law Enforcement Ignored Dire Threats Against Pennsylvania Trump Voters’ Families, Property, And Pets
item.description: It is outrageous that local, state, federal, and postal authorities apparently did absolutely nothing to investigate what happened.

item.title: Christians Are Being Massacred Globally. The U.S. Must Act
item.description: Defenseless Christians in Nigeria and Syria have recently been attacked by extremists intent on purifying those lands for Islam.

item.title: Leftist Supreme Court Justices Want To Parent Your Kids In The Worst Way
item.description: Parents who want to raise their own children without government interference, are grateful leftists are still a minority on SCOTUS

item.title: Explosive Medicaid Growth Calls for Significant Reforms
item.description: Given the growing size of the federal government’s debt, Congress must oblige the states to pay more for programs they want to expand.

item.title: Canadian PM Carney says trade talks with U.S. resume after Canada rescinded tech tax
item.description: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said late Sunday that trade talks with the U.S. have resumed after Canada rescinded its plan to tax U.S. technolog...

item.title: Suspense surrounds Senate vote on Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' as July 4 deadline looms
item.description: Senate Republicans are on schedule to pass President Trump's "big, beautiful bill" on Monday, but whether enough votes exist to do so is a nail-biter.

item.title: Watering Down the SAT Weakens Meritocracy
item.description: If we want a society that truly rewards talent and effort, we must preserve and strengthen the tools that make upward mobility possible.

item.title: Do We Remember How to Be Human to One Another?
item.description: Pope Leo may just save our lives.

item.title: How Trump Rebuffed D.C. Warmongers With One Surgical Strike Against Iran
item.description: For the first time in a generation, the United States is exclusively pursuing its vital interests, not the ambitions of its NatSec elites.

item.title: Is Zohran Mamdani a Lifelong Socialist?
item.description: The New York City mayoral candidate is trying to soft-sell his radicalism.

item.title: Three Pennsylvania Officials Who Cheated In Election Get Prison Time — One Is Still In Office
item.description: The scheme highlights still unaddressed vulnerabilities in the voting process that leave elections ripe for fraud.

item.title: England Codifies A Culture Of Death
item.description: Women will now have more time to abort their children, and everyone will finally have a say in how and when they die.

item.title: Canada rescinds digital services tax after Trump's trade threat
item.description: Canada says it plans to rescind a digital services tax that would have hit U.S. tech companies.

item.title: Republican Senate tax bill would add $3.3 trillion to the U.S. debt load, CBO says
item.description: The changes made to President Trump's big tax bill in the Senate would pile trillions onto the nation's debt load while resulting in even steeper loss...

item.title: Star witness against Kilmar Abrego Garcia won't be deported, court records show
item.description: Court records show that the Trump administration has agreed to spare from deportation a key witness in the federal prosecution of Kilmar Abrego Garcia...
